type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaModuleDependency
type.description: * Dependency on a module in a project. * * @since 1.0-milestone-5

method.name: getDependencyModule
method.description: * returns dependency module, or null if the dependency module is not in the same Gradle build. * * @return dependency module

method.name: getTarget
method.description: * Returns the identifier of the target Idea module. * * @return The target identifier, never null. * @since 2.14

property.name: dependencyModule
property.description: * returns dependency module, or null if the dependency module is not in the same Gradle build. * * @return dependency module

property.name: target
property.description: * Returns the identifier of the target Idea module. * * @return The target identifier, never null. * @since 2.14
